info.description:
# PyFeishu [![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/liukecode/pyfeishu)](https://github.com/liukecode/pyfeishu/issues) [![GitHub forks](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/liukecode/pyfeishu)](https://github.com/liukecode/pyfeishu/network) [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/liukecode/pyfeishu)](https://github.com/liukecode/pyfeishu/stargazers) [![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/liukecode/pyfeishu)](https://github.com/liukecode/pyfeishu/blob/main/LICENSE) [![contributors](https://img.shields.io/github/contributors/liukecode/pyfeishu)](https://github.com/liukecode/pyfeishu/graphs/contributors) [![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/larker)](https://pypi.org/project/larker/) [![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/larker)](https://pypi.org/project/larker/) [![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/larker/month)](https://pepy.tech/project/larker) This is a msg-robot for [feishu](https://open.feishu.cn/document/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/im-v1/introduction) ## Install ``` python -m pip install larker ``` ## Getting Started send text msg ``` import larker bot = larker.Bot(app_id, app_secret) msg = {"text": "test content"} # @single user # msg = {"text": "LiuKe \ntest content"} # @all user # msg = {"text": "所有人 \ntest content"} bot.send_msg(msg, 'chat_id')) ``` send image msg ``` image_key = bot.upload_image("img_path") msg = {"image_key": image_key} bot.send_msg(msg, 'chat_id', 'image') ``` ## Features - Automatically token management - Get chat id - Send text msg - Send rich text - Send image msg ## Contributing Contributions are welcome.
If you've found a bug within this project, please open an issue to discuss what you would like to change.
If it's an issue with the API, please report any new issues at [larker issues](https://github.com/liukecode/pyfeishu)
info.name: larker
info.summary: This is a msg-robot for lark.
